title: Jack Kirby Kamandi the Last Boy on Earth Artist's Edition, Volume 2
description: Jack Kirby's epic story of Kamandi: the Last Boy on Earth continues! Collecting six consecutive complete issues (11-16) which includes the incredible story of Klikklak, the giant grasshopper! In a world of talking animals, Kamandi struggles to make a life for himself as he searches for his fellow humans in a post-apocalyptic landscape. The raw power of Jack "King" Kirby is evident on every page in this gorgeous Artist's Edition. This volume includes the story of how the animals gained their intelligence: "The Hospital!" As with all of IDW's multi-award winning Artist's Edition books, every page is scanned directly from the original art - this is the next best thing to holding Kirby's originals in your hands!
author: Jack Kirby
